entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -21.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 10:48 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -21.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
